website_summaries.verdict: We like this brand for owners who want to introduce dogs to a raw diet without upsetting their digestive systems.
pros: Contains both turkey-flavored kibble and freeze-dried raw turkey
cons: Some dogs develop gas after consumption
Very low ratio of raw meat
Finicky dogs may not like turkey flavor

customer_reviews.title: Rancid food made my dog sick!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two chihuahuas after doing a lot of research. When the food arrived, I gave them a small amount to try. Neither of them ate very much, and one of them spent the rest of the day sick and vomiting. On closer inspection of the food, it smelled horrible. I am sure it is rancid. I had to throw out the whole bag and go to the pet store to get my dogs some good food. I do not know if this was the fault of Amazon or Wellness, but I won't buy this food again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martineau

customer_reviews.title: Adjusting to new food.
customer_reviews.text: My Cavelier really likes this food, especially the turkey pieces. Since it's new food for him, I put in only about a tablespoon into a cup of his regular food. He first ate the turkey pieces out then the rest of the normal food. Well, it was not too long after that he had really terrible diarrhea! I had a real mess to clean up. My husband said that maybe the turkey pieces were bad since I gave him so little. He laid around the rest of the day like he really had a stomach ache. Has anyone else had this problem? I'm hesitant to give him anymore, but I hate to waste an expensive 10 lb bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grain worms from poorly kept storage facilities . .
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag on June 21,2019...5 weeks later I noticed these worms crawling and nesting in my sealed container. I’m not real worried about them hurting my dog as much as I am about him eating old food that could possibly be expired and compromised. They are grain worms that get into the bag from poorly kept storage facilities. Since I’m past the 30 days , I cannot return it. I know the pet stores will return any food or treats up until the bag is empty. I will not be buying anymore dog food online. Update: Amazon did refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: mel musto

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: For more than 10 years, I have been using Wellness Core Small Breed kibble. Since I already know that my dogs love freeze dried dog food, I knew they would enjoy this formula. Happy to report that I was right... this time. Lol! My boys can be sooooo picky. I don't need more than 4 pounds a month, so paying a few bucks more, is not a big deal. I hope the manufacturer adds more of the raw bites in future batch runs. If they begin to add less, I will no longer purchase. This formula does not require refrigeration, in case anyone was wondering.
customer_reviews.author: danaeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I have an extremely adorable yet picky cockapoo and we tried dozens of grain ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely adorable yet picky cockapoo and we tried dozens of grain free food. We tried the best of the best and she turned her nose at everything. So picky that she felt underweight to me. Finally Nature's Variety Raw Boost Small kibble was the only food she would eat but then she started being picky with that. I was frustrated but then I discovered Core RawRev Small Kibble Grain free and OMG......she loves it, happily eats it, looks forward to it and has even gained weight. So happy I found this!
customer_reviews.author: lorena medina

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE, but ordering is hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food our small dogs will eat and they are addicted to the freeze dried bits. However ordering it online can be hit or miss. The bags always arrive sealed and undamaged, but you can tell by the lack of freeze dried bits how rough the bag was handled. They can be broken down into a freeze dried dust if the bags are thrown around. I've even experienced this when ordering from petco/petsmart. It's a 50/50 chance on getting a bag with everything in tact.
customer_reviews.author: A R.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy 14 year old doggie
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food my dog will eat. I decided to put my dog on a higher quality food after the vet told us he had a heart murmur. After struggling to find one my dog would actually eat, we landed on this brand. After a few months the vet said his murmur was practically gone. This could be attributed to the food or something else, but now we have a healthy senior dog that’s excited about meal time again. He first eats the Raw pieces (he thinks they are treats) and then goes back to eat the rest
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog
customer_reviews.text: It did not go well with my dog; she had the runs for a few days so I had to take her to the Vet clinic.
customer_reviews.author: Nel96825

customer_reviews.title: What happened to quality control?
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this dog food has gone down. In my experience there seems to be less of the "raw" ingredients in the bags I bought. The last bag was the tipping point. you know how the food at the bottom of the bag is all crumbs and a chunk here and there? Well that's what the whole bag looked like. I decided it was time to change brands. I talked to my dog's vet and she said that I shouldn't buy raw food anyway. I would have rated this even lower but for a while it was very good.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hofmann

customer_reviews.title: 😭
customer_reviews.text: My peek a poo is a small breed dog & got sick from this dog food she had a allergic reaction & became very ill the first time using this food 12 days using she started vomiting blood & every time she peed it was bright red blood😢 I put her back on her orig food & with meds she is doing a bit better. Scariest thing ever. Was too late to return the opened bag. Was just happy I didn’t lose her😭 will never buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: rain martin

customer_reviews.title: If you have a fussy dog who doesn't like their food get this
customer_reviews.text: If you have a fussy dog who doesn't like their food get this, my dog would not eat any food but she gobbled this and it's very healthy especially for sensitive food allergies. Try it your dog will love it.
customer_reviews.author: ANONOMOUS

customer_reviews.title: very few raw meat bits, but dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wellness Core ingredients are really good overall, but the freeze dried raw meat bits are very few and far between the regular kibble. I don't mind so much because the price is about right for what you get. I give my dog one scoop of Wellness Core in the morning and in the evening I give her one scoop of Ziwipeak with is almost all meat with no filler. Ziwipeak costs abut 4 times as much as Wellness Core. My dog, who is picky, loves them both and is getting a well rounded diet
customer_reviews.author: cjs view

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergic dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of several grain-free products from Wellness that we feed our three rescued Shih Tzus. We have been able to decrease the amount of allergy meds by using this formula. One pup is almost off her meds entirely, while one still has some issues that are unrelated to his food. But he has gone from one tablet a day to one every third day. This product helped immensely.
customer_reviews.author: JudithTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for my picky eater!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 year old miniature pomeranian and he is the pickiest eater EVER! I've tried several different brands of dog food over his lifetime and usually after about 3 weeks of the same food, he will stop eating. I finally found the PERFECT food for him! He's been eating this now for about 6 months and still gets excited for his breakfast every morning. I would highly recommend this if you have a picky eater!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Feamster

customer_reviews.title: Bug infested
customer_reviews.text: I have this item on subscribe and save. I’ve never had a problem with this product in past but my last bag was infested with bugs. I also noticed the bag was very dusty inside, like the food had a sawdust type quality which caused the dust. I’ve canceled this item from my subscribe and save. I don’t think I’ll order again because I don’t feel comfortable feeding this to my dog anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Love Raw Rev...But is this it???
customer_reviews.text: My last 2 deliveries of this normally FANTASTIC product have been about 40% dust and I have counted less than 20 of the raw pieces. Not good, Amazon. I will buy from the store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisamarie

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: This dog food was introduced to me by an employee at PetSmart when I got my Chi at four months old. He LOVES this food, I think mainly because of the dried raw bites. I've made the mistake of buying the one without the nibbles ,and he wouldn't eat it... until he had to. This is an excellent dog food, has all you dog needs and worth the money. I purchased two five pound bags since the price was so low, usually it's around $20! So, I've got two plus months of my pups favorite food!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony R. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: large chunks warning
customer_reviews.text: It contains some very large chunks of free -dry meat -too large for small and old toothless dogs . I have an old multi-poo who has very few teeth left. I usually buy him a small breed dog food due to its small kibble size . This was my first and last time buying this or any other kind of raw dry food because they all contain HUGE dried meat kibbles that take forever to cut into smaller pieces. BGecides it is tasteless and has no smell so my dog refused to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Lana S

customer_reviews.title: Great food, but wrong kibble size
customer_reviews.text: We typically love this food. It's the only one my picky chihuahua will eat after years of experimenting with different foods. However, this latest shipment had the wrong size kibble. The pieces were too large and painful for my dog to eat when usually the pieces are nice and small. Super disappointed. Will go back to buying from Pet Pros.
customer_reviews.author: April G.

customer_reviews.title: Wellness Core Raw Rev dog food has changed
customer_reviews.text: I am a regular customer of Wellness Core dry dog food, Recently the food has been broken up and most of it looks like sawdust. It is disgusting. There is very little turkey pieces in the bag. Looks like dregs from the bottom of the barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This is a great dog food but ....
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this from amazon before - no issues - but this time - it made my two dachshunds quite sick. I’m sure it’s just a bad bag or something - but beware. I’m sure any dog food could do this - this is more about this food than Amazon of course. Our stores are all out of this - not sure where Amazon gets theirs - but it’s hard to feed dogs commercially made dog food anymore truly. #homemade food is best it seems
customer_reviews.author: AZ Chick

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I found this food a couple years ago because my dog loved it. Since then, the quality seems to have gone down. He doesn't like it as much and the freeze dried meat pieces he loves so much have been reduced significantly. The bag we received last month barely had any in it and he doesn't even want to touch the food. I'm definitely going to be on the hunt for another food if the next bag isn't better.
customer_reviews.author: ANatureNut

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog happy mom
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pomeranian poodle (pomapoo) 13 yrs old and he absolutely loves this food. Doesn't make him gassy. First he's ever asked to actually be fed. Of course he picks out the chunks first but then he'll go thru the rest. Super happy wellness came out with this. Have been using wellness now for 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Great Healthy food for picky dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 pound Pomeranian who is the worlds pickiest dog when it comes to food. It got to the point were I would have to hand feed him. We have always given him Wellness core Small breed kibble as well as their canned Turkey. When we gave him this kibble he went crazy! He loves all the turkey pieces! If you have a picky dog I would recommended trying this out.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Old dog approves
customer_reviews.text: My old Dorky (Dachsund/Yorkie) loves this. She's 15 and very picky when it comes to dry food. Can't blame your old dog to be picky at that age. Treat them well in their finally years and get them some quality, healthy, tasty food.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Old girl acting like a puppy again
customer_reviews.text: Good food for senior dogs, it's pricey but when they are up there in years, I'd recommend swinging it if you can. I used to buy supplements, but here you have the glucosamine+chondroitin baked in (to help with joint swelling and inflammation). If you can, buy the big bags that have generous bits of freeze-dried turkey (which is super pricey to buy alone and she LOVES it and it's easy to chew even with few teeth) throughout the food. This little brat eats better than me or anyone in my family but hey, she's my dogter. ;-;
customer_reviews.author: KD Bee

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it but cheaper options available
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the flavor of this dog food. Have been eating wellness brand since they were puppies but really seem to enjoy the addition of raw rev pieces. The food is expensive so if you are a new dog owner maybe a cheaper option would be better. Over all good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JJNICE

customer_reviews.title: Dog's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this food. She always eats the meat pieces out of it first and then goes back for the kibbles. It's a bit pricier than the last food we gave her, but we will definitely stick with this. It's nice knowing it's a good quality food and she eats it right up.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: HURRAY!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is 18, deaf, feeble and going blind. I am appalled at the sheer JUNK people feed to their 'best friends'. This is perfect with no junk and he loves it. Four pounds is much more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: M'ette

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved this food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this food. Unfortunately I had to change her to sensitive stomach food because she kept getting upset stomachs. Not 100% sure if this food was the cause or not. She was fine with it for a while but I've switched her to limited ingredient foods and treats.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Picky Eater
customer_reviews.text: My 12 pound Yorkie didn’t like it. She likes v-dog. The kibbles were probably too big compared to what she’s used too. She didn’t even want the freeze dried bits. Wish I had got from chewy.com so that I could return it. Too bad, she loves petite treats. I thought this would automatically be her favorite kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: it was her own food poor thing. They need to do better quality check
customer_reviews.text: Pros: have been purchasing for about a year with no issues Cons: (1) last batch did not contain turkey bits as it is supposed to (2) it made our dog sick for days until we narrowed down what was making her sick, it was her own food poor thing. They need to do better quality check, we can't trust this manufacturer/seller anymore.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: High grade food Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I can talk all day about this food..best one in the market and believe me I read the analysis...dogs love it picky eaters they are and they eat it just fine...helps to control weight since they get fuller faster..
customer_reviews.author: MxClark

customer_reviews.title: Highly rated
customer_reviews.text: My 14-year-old Maltipoo has eaten Wellness Dog Food her whole life and her Vet says she is one of the healthiest dogs he has ever seen. As soon as this Core Rawrev came on the market I began feeding it to her, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: J. O. Gamauf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: My small breed dog won't go back to the regular Wellness CORE Original product -- much more inclined to eat the RawRev version. Great price and delivered to the doorstep!
customer_reviews.author: EBG87

customer_reviews.title: Yorkie approved but...
customer_reviews.text: Our Yorkie seems to like this food, but for a small breed product, the kibble size is quite large. Would be 5 stars if the kibble size was more appropriate for small breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pomeranians
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranian loves this kibble, especially the raw bits. The kibble size is perfect for him and his small mouth/teeth (he weighs 7 lbs). I feel confident that this food is good for him because he is maintaining his weight and has high energy levels too.
customer_reviews.author: Serge Lobatch

customer_reviews.title: Very picky Maltipoo, loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog food. Our Maltipoo is very picky!!! But this food is a hit. I am very thankful we finally found a good quality food that works for our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for little dogs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our pomeranians love this food! Coat looks better and my senior dog seems to have more energy too!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.N0e

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog's coat beautiful and healthy.
customer_reviews.text: We switched to this food 4 years ago and it has been the best decision for our dog. Our dog loves the raw bits in it, she eats those first and then lingers on the rest, too funny.
customer_reviews.author: Ceelo

customer_reviews.title: This is our second bag and I am noticing that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second bag and I am noticing that the raw pieces are becoming less and less scarce and this is what my dogs prefer about this dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Robbins

customer_reviews.title: My dog has eaten Core his whole life. I ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has eaten Core his whole life. I believe this is the same kibble as Wellness Core with the addition of freeze dried meat. My dog will eat it without a topper (for months now) so it's a win for me!
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Great, but inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: This is all I feed my dog and he loves the raw pieces, but super annoying that some bags seems to have a bunch of the raw pieces and some bags have very little...not consistent at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elysse Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My two pups love this Raw Rev dog food! I like that it has a resealable top to keep it fresh. The only thing is that is VERY expensive so I just use it as more of a special meal. But the dehydrated raw bits of meat is the favorite in my house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Stuff
customer_reviews.text: It is very tasty and has chunks of turkey. It is not quite as good as what the boss eats. (Boss is the guy with the thumbs that wrote this review for me.)
customer_reviews.author: abacus

customer_reviews.title: Great brand and my picky senior loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My picky senior dog and puppy both love this food!!!! Will buy this food from now on. Was buying the Wellness Senior small bites and they liked it ok but they really love the tender bites in this bag! The brand seems to be really good high quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua has been with us for 7 years and he's always been underweight. We've tried many things to get him to a regular weight. He's only half way through the back and we've already noticed a difference. He looks more healthy and gets excited when he knows its time to eat. Every time, he finishes his plate and sometimes asked for more. We will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good product but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Took my two dogs to like the change but now seem to be ok with the change in taste. A little expensive but my babies are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cost is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: Our little Tinkerbell really loved the new food. We were having serious trouble with the other brand we were giving her. Vet thought it was because she was allergic to grains, but Wellness Grain Free has no grain and it did help with her itching.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Farinha

customer_reviews.title: Rawrev for small breeds
customer_reviews.text: Good healthy grain free food, although I rotate on occasion this is the dog's go to everytime, they love it with plenty of raw pieces.
customer_reviews.author: KofC

customer_reviews.title: Kibble size changed
customer_reviews.text: I had this product on auto ship. Unfortunately when I received my last order the kibble size is much larger than it used to be. My dog loves this food however the kibbles are now too big for her to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Healthier poo
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie, Bailey, has an extremely sensitive stomach. She can not have any table foods, whatsoever. I also have to be careful with treats and dog foods. The first ingredient has to be meat. This dog food is pricey but it works well for her, which means less work for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend found a tiny piece of shard glass in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Bugs and rotten pieces.
customer_reviews.text: There was dead bugs and rotten pieces inside the bag. Not sure about the quality control aspect of this company but somebody was asleep when they checked it.
customer_reviews.author: Toby snowden

customer_reviews.title: Only dog food brand I buy
customer_reviews.text: Only dog food I buy for my dogs. Convenient to buy off of amazon than going to a store
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: False advertising. No frozen turkey.
customer_reviews.text: FALSE ADVERTISING!! This kibble doesn’t have any frozen turkey. It is so disappointing. Wellness core without frozen turkey costs less and the whole point of paying so much is to get them. Very disappointing to see someone take advantage of customers like this.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this brand mostly because of the freeze dried bits in it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Used to be my go to product.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed. My dog has been one this food for a While and has always loved it. This last time the bag had a small odd hole. I had poured it in my container and also noticed the freeze dried bits looked different.. most were black as if it had a burned look to it. The next day after eating this my dog has been throwing up. I just hope it doesn’t get any worse.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love the Turkey Bites
customer_reviews.text: My dogs all love this food, and it's easy for my geriatric chihuahua with very few remaining teeth to eat.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: It’s different from petsmart
customer_reviews.text: My dog got really sick for three days. She got better as soon as I switch to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are in love with this food! The kibble is small enough for both my small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. I subscribe to it and get it every month. My pup can smell it through the box it comes in and won’t stop bothering me until I open up box and show him his food!
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Doge hates hard food .... but he will eat this
customer_reviews.text: We have a maltipoo that's pretty spoiled but, he will chow down on this.
customer_reviews.author: htxotis

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the meaty bits. It’s a great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog's favorite
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a picky eater with a sensitive stomach. She loves this and it doesn't upset her stomach - which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Sindy

customer_reviews.title: Allergy dog loves
customer_reviews.text: Great for an old dog with lots of food allergies. The only thing we have found that she can eat.
customer_reviews.author: Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Where are the raw bites pieces
customer_reviews.text: Isn't this supposed to have those raw bites pieces? Not one piece....
customer_reviews.author: GhillieK9

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My pet really only likes the raw parts . . .
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality food!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my dogs, they love every bite. We've been using this brand for years since we like to feed them grain free and also the raw bites are just a perfect combination.
customer_reviews.author: Yaritza

customer_reviews.title: glad we made the change from Royal Canine to this
customer_reviews.text: My Morkie has SO much more energy after we switched her to this!...glad we made the change from Royal Canine to this!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: So Happy We Switched!
customer_reviews.text: I switched my dog to this brand from WholeEarth she usually didn't finish all of her dry food and was never in a rush to eat it. After switching to RawRev she loves it and as soon as I fill her bowl it's empty!! Her bathroom work has been much better and she is definitely getting in more nutrition! She loves the freeze dried chicken and turkey it's the best part!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: She’s super picky with her dog food so Hands down a ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog goes absolutely wild whenever we give this to her. She’s super picky with her dog food so Hands down a win!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Kublin

customer_reviews.title: too expensive
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff. There love the freeze dried bits. Major problem is that it is WAY TOO EXPENSIVE above all others!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this dog food as long as I put wet ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this dog food as long as I put wet dog food in it as well. its' pretty dry otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the pet store
customer_reviews.text: This did not have as many raw bits as the bags in the store. Would not recommend getting again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog food
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good dog food I just wish it had more Chunks of the meat in it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Grain free great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food for my little dog. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: sammy01

customer_reviews.title: My dog can't get enough
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a very picky eater, I find that majority of the brands he doesn't really like. But when it comes to wellness products he always eat the food
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Louis

customer_reviews.title: CORE DOG FOOD
customer_reviews.text: Core is the only brand my little dog will eat. I’ve tried many other brands and this is the one she enjoys. I would highly recommend this dog food for anyone who wants their dog to eat healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Nuttynita

customer_reviews.title: My pug loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a one ingredient topper. Healthy and my pug loves it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Woodley

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: Dog ate it once then got sick. Won’t go anywhere near it. Probably a bad batch, didn’t have issues with larger bag just the 4 pound.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: My dog actually eats this!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say if it tastes good or not, but my super picky dog actually eats this food, which is a borderline miracle.
customer_reviews.author: DocHon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My Abbie loves it! Set up on auto ship and done!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Flemming

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this brand of kibble, especially the raw bits!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Leong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like this food and I feel like it’s better than the average dog food
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: This new dog food made my dog sick. Fatigue and diarrhea. We tried it twice hoping it’s not the dog food. Can’t trust this brand. Very sad to see my little Pekingese so ill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my dog absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.text: the freeze dried meat pieces in it definitely made it extra attractive! My pup loves it!

product_meta.title: Wellness CORE Rawrev Natural Dry Dog Food Small Breed
product_meta.description: Style:Grain Free| Size:10 Pound BagAt their core, your dog instinctively craves raw animal protein. That’s why our revolutionary CORE RawRev recipes gives your dog the pure protein, natural enzymes and full flavor they need to thrive. We thoughtfully prepare our CORE RawRev kibble and freeze-dried bites to keep the ingredients in their purest form and ensure every mealtime is packed with nourishment and enjoyment. Welcome to the Raw Revolution! . Calorie Content - This food contains 3,708 kcal/kg or 407 kcal/cup ME (metabolizable energy) on an as fed basis.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED NATURAL NUTRITION TO FUEL YOUR SMALL BREED DOG'S BEST LIFE: High protein, nutrient dense kibble combines with 100% raw freeze dried turkey for a crave worthy dog food; with optimal protein levels and calorie content to support higher energy needs of small breed dogs
SAVORY FOOD DOGS LOVE: Wellness CORE is available in grain and grain free recipes, as well as limited ingredient diets for dogs with food sensitivities
LEANER BODY MASS AND MUSCLE TONE: Wellness CORE dog food is made with a high concentration of protein from fresh meat ingredients
SUPPORTS HEALTHY SKIN AND COAT with guaranteed levels of omega fatty acids from ingredients such as flaxseed and salmon oil
WHOLE BODY HEALTH: Supported by omega fatty acids, antioxidants, glucosamine, probiotics and taurine for a healthy heart

Made in the USA using only the finest globally sourced ingredients, we prepare each of our diets in our own state of the art facility; we craft delicious natural recipes with wholesome, non GMO ingredients chosen for their nutritional benefits
